core.utils¶

core.utils.global_constants¶

This is where global constants are stored. Default Picture locations and Default Haircut Locations are stored here.

core.utils.view_logic¶

This class contains a series of common methods that are utilized throughout the core app.

class core.utils.view_logic.CookieClearer[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is important because of how cookies are used. For example, the stylist_pk is stored in a cookie and is used to retrieve the stylist and the stylist’s information at different pages. However, this same cookie might be used in a different setting, a setting where you might not want to see the same stylist that you scheduled the appointment with.

After a big function (such as creating an appointment) is completed the cookies are all cleared by invoking the method in this class.
static appointment_cookies(request)[source]¶
static clear(cookie_names, request)[source]¶
class core.utils.view_logic.UserLogic[source]¶

Bases: object

Common methods relating to User

static login(request, user)[source]¶
static redirect_to_dashboard(request)[source]¶

Directs the user to the proper dashboard or profile page depending on their is_stylist or superuser status.

static retrieve_user(request)[source]¶
static update_average(review)[source]¶

This method is called whenever a new review is made. | It takes the given review and pulls the stylist and customer users from it. | Then every review pertaining to the customer and stylist is pulled. | The ratings of all these reviews are averaged then stored to the stylist’s or customer’s average rating field.

static upload_picture(request)[source]¶

Redundant - should remove.
